name: SIDE-EYE: WRONG TURNS, ROAD BURNS
description:
-this project is complete. small changes will be made whenever possible for polish but it is otherwise readable.--this project contains flashing images, gore and themes of unreality. viewer discretion is advised.-

A SHORT VISUAL NOVEL ABOUT LESBIANS AND MONSTERS

Grata Maria da Conceição is a young adult that does what she wants whenever she wants, streaming her life stalking minor celebrities with her eye implants - cameras she uses to stream everything she can get her eyes on.

Grata sees something she really isn't interested in, but there are people willing to pay for her exclusive perspective. Will she give up the privacy of her eyes, or will she make her content exclusive to her thousands of followers?

----
A master's degree project written, illustrated, programmed and animated by @riotbreakerr with incredible music by Robin R.

You can read a complementary investigative article, Designing the Body: Female Monster Design in Video Games here.

The report on this project  will be uploaded in it's native language when available.
